name: MË PAK KUBE
description:
Is a game about clicking on the black cubes to gain more points that will be displayed on the menu. 

You cannot let the red Square touch the ground. 

The red Square slowly turns black so it makes it harder to see as well as change shape. 

When you think you’ve got enough points press any key on the keyboard to move to the next round.

Left Click to destroy

ESC to go menu
